thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice stay
thread.title_full: Nice stay - Review of Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sodermalm66
title: Nice stay
text:
The service was excellent, the room large and the location was perfect.
When asked they let us check out later and keep our room until 5pm.
The cafe had nice cakes and other tasty items.
I have to commend the breakfast too. Fresh blueberries, gluten free bread and tasty bacon gave us a great start of the day!
